data.Name: Stuart Mavis
data.Bio: Stuart Mavis creates catchy popmusic with rapinfluences. With only one demo available online Stuart Mavis is doing more than 50 live performances in 2013. With his band he builds up an excellent reputation and plays at the freedom festivals of Friesland and Groningen and as a support act for Moss. Stuart Mavis wants to start off 2014 on the right foot by releasing his single 'Different Generations' with an accompanying videoclip. You can check him out twice during the official programme of Eurosonic/Noorderslag. Read more on Last.fm
